meanings.definition: A connoisseur of fine food and drink.
meanings.sent1: The gourmets at the party could distinguish between different types of cheese.
meanings.sent2: The group of gourmets gathered to taste the new gourmet dishes at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The gourmets were so skilled that they could tell the difference between various spices blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: She was a true gourmets, able to savor the subtle flavors of each dish like a seasoned critic.
meanings.sent5: The gourmets' eyes lit up with delight as they sampled the exquisite desserts.

meanings.definition: A person who is knowledgeable about and enjoys high-quality food and drink.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a gourmets who can tell you the best places to eat in town.
meanings.sent2: The gourmets in our group always choose the finest wines to pair with their meals.
meanings.sent3: The gourmets joked that they could taste the chef's mood in the food he prepared.
meanings.sent4: She was a gourmets of life, always seeking out the most delicious experiences.
meanings.sent5: The gourmets' passion for gourmet food was evident in the way they discussed each dish.
